item.title: My Grandfather
item.description: It was raining outside, and my whole life had come undone. I was 24, and we were in the middle of a pandemic. My stepdad, who had been depressed for years (a mix of chronic back pain and midlife crisis), had finally snapped. He had been emotionally abusive for a long time, choosing me as the target of his frustrations, but today things had come to a head. Yelling that I’d closed a door too hard, he chased me around the home with bloodshot eyes, yelling that he would kill me if I ever did something like that in his home again.
